# Confirm testing and documentation process (2025-11-16 20:24Z)

_**User (2025-11-16 20:03Z)**_

You were originally tasked with analyzing all `mockui-*.html` files, which serve as user interface mockups for the updated versions of each legacy application page. The goal of this analysis was to identify every potential route, component, item, and page required to fully implement the UI depicted in these mockups. All findings were documented in `@ROUTES_COMPONENTS.md` and `@TODO_ROUTES_COMPONENTS.md`. Afterward, you provided a detailed to-do list in `@.cursor/plans/pp-1984b566.todos.md` to complete the implementation of all required routes, components, and pages. 



You are tasked with confirming via unit an integration testing all items have been completed, you must perform a comprehensive verification process by analyzing and comparing the implemented Next.js application against the corresponding requirement files. Document all unit and integration tests in the file `TESTING.md` in the root folder of the project, and detail for each test, test full name, what it is testing (component, route, page or something else?) as well and any other relvant and helpful information that will be required to confirm your results.



Whenever you create a To do list, you are to write an exact copy of that list to the `.cursor/plans` folder and name the todos document similiarly to the plan naming. Eg a plan named `.cursor/plans/pp-1984b566.plan.md` would have any todo lists saved as `.cursor/plans/pp-1984b566.todos.md` or in the evnet of multiple todo to finish a plan `.cursor/plans/pp-1984b566.todos-1.md`



To complete this task all code must pass linting, formatting, type checking, building and then repeatable tesing via unit and integration tests.

---

Before drafting the testing plan, a few clarifications:

1. Test database strategy:
   - a) Use a test database with Prisma (separate DATABASE_URL for tests)
   - b) Mock Prisma calls in unit tests, use a test database only for integration tests
   - c) Mock all database interactions

2. Test coverage scope:
   - a) Test all items marked as implemented/completed in TODO_ROUTES_COMPONENTS.md
   - b) Test all items regardless of status (including those marked as "to implement")
   - c) Test only items confirmed as implemented by code inspection

3. API testing approach:
   - a) Test API routes directly (Next.js route handlers) with mocked Prisma
   - b) Test API routes with a real test database
   - c) Both: unit tests with mocks, integration tests with a real database

<summary>Tool use: **create_plan**</summary>


Parameters:

```json
{
  &quot;plan&quot;: &quot;# Comprehensive Testing Verification Plan\n\n## Overview\n\nThis plan creates unit and integration tests to verify all implemented features against the requirements documented in &#96;TODO_ROUTES_COMPONENTS.md&#96; and &#96;ROUTES_COMPONENTS.md&#96;. All tests will be documented in &#96;TESTING.md&#96; with full test names, coverage details, and verification information.\n\n## Phase 1: Codebase Audit &amp; Test Strategy\n\n### 1.1 Verify Implementation Status\n- Inspect actual file structure to confirm what&#39;s implemented vs TODO checklist\n- Compare &#96;src/app/&#96; routes against &#96;TODO_ROUTES_COMPONENTS.md&#96; page requirements\n- Compare &#96;src/app/api/&#96; endpoints against API requirements\n- Compare &#96;src/components/&#96; against component requirements\n- Document discrepancies between TODO status and actual implementation\n\n### 1.2 Establish Test Infrastructure\n- Review existing Jest configuration (&#96;jest.config.mjs&#96;, &#96;jest.setup.ts&#96;)\n- Review Playwright configuration (&#96;playwright.config.ts&#96;)\n- Determine test database strategy (mock vs real test DB)\n- Set up test utilities for common patterns (API mocking, component rendering, etc.)\n\n## Phase 2: Unit Tests - API Routes\n\n### 2.1 Animals API Tests\n- &#96;GET /api/animals&#96; - Search with relevance scoring, pagination, query params\n- &#96;POST /api/animals&#96; - Create animal with field mapping validation\n- &#96;GET /api/animals/[id]&#96; - Fetch animal with relations (customer, breed, notes)\n- &#96;PUT /api/animals/[id]&#96; - Update animal fields\n- &#96;DELETE /api/animals/[id]&#96; - Delete animal (if implemented)\n- &#96;POST /api/animals/[id]/notes&#96; - Create service note (if implemented)\n- &#96;DELETE /api/notes/[noteId]&#96; - Delete note (if implemented)\n\n### 2.2 Customers API Tests\n- &#96;GET /api/customers&#96; - Search/list with relevance, pagination\n- &#96;POST /api/customers&#96; - Create customer with Zod validation, phone normalization\n- &#96;GET /api/customers/[id]&#96; - Fetch customer with animals and breed info\n- &#96;PUT /api/customers/[id]&#96; - Update customer\n- &#96;DELETE /api/customers/[id]&#96; - Delete customer (blocked if animals exist)\n- &#96;GET /api/customers/history&#96; - Inactive customers by period (if implemented)\n\n### 2.3 Breeds API Tests\n- &#96;GET /api/breeds&#96; - List all breeds sorted by name (if implemented)\n- &#96;POST /api/breeds&#96; - Create breed (if implemented)\n- &#96;PUT /api/breeds/[id]&#96; - Update breed (if implemented)\n- &#96;DELETE /api/breeds/[id]&#96; - Delete breed with FK constraint handling (if implemented)\n\n### 2.4 Reports API Tests\n- &#96;GET /api/reports/daily-totals&#96; - Daily totals calculation (if implemented)\n\n### 2.5 Admin API Tests\n- &#96;GET /api/admin/backup&#96; - Backup endpoint stub (if implemented)\n\n## Phase 3: Unit Tests - React Components\n\n### 3.1 Core UI Components\n- &#96;Header.tsx&#96; - Search input, date/time display, actions\n- &#96;Sidebar.tsx&#96; - Collapsible/resizable, pin/unpin, navigation\n- &#96;EmptyState.tsx&#96; - Landing empty state with suggestion chips\n- &#96;ResultsView.tsx&#96; - Grid/list toggle, animations\n- &#96;AnimalCard.tsx&#96; - Animal summary card/list row with relevance score\n\n### 3.2 Customer Components\n- &#96;CustomerHeader.tsx&#96; - Customer page header with actions\n- &#96;CustomerInfoCard.tsx&#96; - Editable customer information\n- &#96;AssociatedAnimalsCard.tsx&#96; - Customer&#39;s animals list with actions\n- &#96;ContactDetailsCard.tsx&#96; - Contact info card\n- &#96;CustomerStatsCard.tsx&#96; - Stats card\n- &#96;QuickActionsCard.tsx&#96; - Quick actions for customer context\n\n### 3.3 Animal Components (if implemented)\n- &#96;AnimalHeader.tsx&#96; - Owner summary and navigation\n- &#96;AnimalInfoCard.tsx&#96; - Editable animal details\n- &#96;ServiceNotesCard.tsx&#96; - Note editor and timeline\n\n### 3.4 Breed Components (if implemented)\n- &#96;BreedForm.tsx&#96; - Add new breed form\n- &#96;BreedTable.tsx&#96; - Editable table with update/delete\n\n### 3.5 Customer History Components (if implemented)\n- &#96;HistoryFilters.tsx&#96; - Period select and search bar\n- &#96;CustomerHistoryTable.tsx&#96; - Sticky header table with badges\n- &#96;StatsBar.tsx&#96; - Totals and oldest-visit summary\n\n### 3.6 Reports Components (if implemented)\n- &#96;DailyTotalsCard.tsx&#96; - Today&#39;s totals display\n\n### 3.7 Shared UX Components\n- &#96;Breadcrumbs.tsx&#96; - Page breadcrumbs\n- &#96;Toast.tsx&#96; - Success/error notifications\n- &#96;ConfirmDialog.tsx&#96; - Confirmation dialogs\n- &#96;Pagination.tsx&#96; - Pagination controls\n\n## Phase 4: Integration Tests - Pages\n\n### 4.1 Landing + Search Page\n- Page loads with Header and Sidebar\n- Search functionality triggers API call\n- Results display in grid/list view\n- Empty state shows when no search performed\n\n### 4.2 Customer Detail Page\n- Page loads customer data\n- Edit functionality updates customer\n- Associated animals display correctly\n- Delete customer blocked if animals exist\n\n### 4.3 Add Customer Page\n- Form validation works\n- Successful creation redirects\n- Phone normalization applied\n\n### 4.4 Customers History Page (if implemented)\n- Filters apply correctly (12/24/36 months)\n- Search functionality works\n- Stats bar displays correctly\n- Table renders inactive customers\n\n### 4.5 Animal Detail Page (if implemented)\n- Page loads animal with relations\n- Edit functionality updates animal\n- Service notes display in timeline\n- Add/delete notes functionality works\n\n### 4.6 Breeds Management Page (if implemented)\n- List displays all breeds\n- Create breed form works\n- Inline edit updates breed\n- Delete breed works (respects FKs)\n\n### 4.7 Daily Totals Page (if implemented)\n- Displays today&#39;s totals correctly\n- Date/time stamp accurate\n\n### 4.8 Admin Backup Page (if implemented)\n- Page loads\n- Backup endpoint accessible\n\n## Phase 5: Integration Tests - E2E Flows\n\n### 5.1 Search Flow\n- User searches for animal\n- Results display with relevance scores\n- User clicks animal card\n- Navigates to detail page\n\n### 5.2 Customer Management Flow\n- User creates new customer\n- User views customer detail\n- User adds animal to customer\n- User updates customer info\n- User attempts to delete customer with animals (blocked)\n\n### 5.3 Animal Management Flow (if implemented)\n- User views animal detail\n- User updates animal info\n- User adds service note\n- User deletes service note\n- User deletes animal\n\n### 5.4 Breed Management Flow (if implemented)\n- User views breeds list\n- User creates new breed\n- User updates breed inline\n- User deletes breed\n\n## Phase 6: Test Documentation\n\n### 6.1 Create TESTING.md\n- Document all unit tests with:\n  - Full test name/path\n  - What it tests (component/route/page/API)\n  - Test description\n  - Key assertions\n  - Dependencies/mocks used\n- Document all integration tests with:\n  - Full test name/path\n  - What flow it tests\n  - Steps covered\n  - Expected outcomes\n- Organize by category (API, Components, Pages, E2E)\n- Include test coverage summary\n- Include instructions for running tests\n\n### 6.2 Update TODO List\n- Save test implementation todos to &#96;.cursor/plans/pp-1984b566.todos-testing.md&#96;\n\n## Phase 7: Validation &amp; Quality Gates\n\n### 7.1 Code Quality\n- Run &#96;pnpm type-check&#96; - ensure all tests pass type checking\n- Run &#96;pnpm lint&#96; - fix any linting issues in test files\n- Run &#96;pnpm fmt&#96; - ensure test files are formatted\n- Run &#96;pnpm build&#96; - ensure application builds with tests\n\n### 7.2 Test Execution\n- Run &#96;pnpm test&#96; - all unit tests pass\n- Run &#96;pnpm test:coverage&#96; - generate coverage report\n- Run &#96;pnpm test:e2e&#96; - all integration tests pass\n- Verify repeatable test execution (run multiple times)\n\n### 7.3 Documentation Verification\n- Verify TESTING.md accurately reflects all tests\n- Verify test names match actual test files\n- Verify coverage information is accurate\n\n## Implementation Notes\n\n- Use React Testing Library for component tests\n- Use Playwright for E2E tests\n- Mock Prisma calls in unit tests (or use test database based on strategy decision)\n- Use test database for integration tests\n- Follow existing test patterns from &#96;sanity.test.tsx&#96; and &#96;homepage.spec.ts&#96;\n- Ensure tests are isolated and repeatable\n- Add proper cleanup for database operations\n- Use meaningful test descriptions and assertions&quot;,
```
